name: Calm One HopTea
description: This is probably the most delicious HopTea, the sweet smoothness of chamomile suits the flavors very well. Citra hops.

name: Really Hoppy One HopTea
description: The flavors of this aren't very balanced, I find it overly hoppy but not delicious.

name: Green Tea One HopTea
description: Pretty good balance of very light beverage and good hop aroma. Mosaic hops.

name: Mile-High-Biscus One HopTea
description: Surprisingly delicious, I didn't expect to like the hibiscus, but it adds nicely to the aroma.

name: Hop Splash
description: Tastes like a normal sparkling water, the hops are there, but its pretty light and the favor isn't totally balanced. Refreshing. Citra and Amarillo hops.

name: Juicy IPA
description: Marketed as non-alcoholic craft brew, this goes for beeriness and does a good job. Interestingly, the taste and aroma in the first few minutes is GREAT, but then it seems to gradually get sweeter and less delicious as it warms.

name: Non-Alcoholic IPA
description: Pretty solid as a basic IPA substitute.

name: Run Wild IPA
description: This is pretty delicious as an light IPA.
